SystemController
Class GameFileManager

java.lang.Object
  SystemController.GameFileManager

public class GameFileManager
extends java.lang.Object

Interface in charge of saving and loading gamePlay files from the system.

Field Detail

saveDirectory

public static java.lang.String saveDirectory
Constructor Detail

GameFileManager

public GameFileManager(java.lang.String username)
Initialize an instance of GameFileManager. It receives a string specifying the username of the currently logged in user. This is the only key necessary to access the corresponding directory where the user's files are stored.

Parameters:
username -
Method Detail

saveGame

public static void saveGame(GamePlayManager gamePlayManager,
                            java.lang.String fileName)
Serializes an instance of the GamePlayManager object the user decides to save. Then stores the .ser file to a directory specifically created for the user that is generated when his/her account is created using the account creation system.

Parameters:
gamePlayManager - The GamePlayManager instance containing all the information regarding the current state of the game. Including all enemy objects, the current score, the level progression, etc.
fileName - A String selected by the user to distinguish the save file.

loadGame

public static GamePlayManager loadGame(java.lang.String fileName)
Loads a state of the game previously saved by the user.

Parameters:
fileName - The name of the file containing the instance of GamePlayManager to be loaded.
Returns:
The GamePlayManager instance that was stored in the saved file.

setUserName

public static void setUserName(java.lang.String userName)
Associates an username with this instance of the GameFileManager.

Parameters:
userName - A String specifying the username of the player to associate with the GameFileManager.
